CustomField.description: Displays the Amount from the Impacted Opportunity if it is a closed lost Opportunity and if the Opportunity Generated from Clinical Prog box is checked
CustomField.formula: IF( AND ( Opportunity_Generated_From_Clinical_Prog__c = TRUE, Impacted_Opportunity__r.IsWon = FALSE, Impacted_Opportunity__r.IsClosed = TRUE ), Impacted_Opportunity__r.Amount, 0 )
CustomField.label: Related Opp Lost Amount
